website_summaries.verdict: Its solid construction makes it a fine beginner’s drone, and once they’ve mastered it, this lightweight model excels at making all kinds of quick mid-air turns and flips.
pros: Powerful LED lights make nighttime flights possible
cons: Flying in the dark like Batman is great, but its 9 minute battery life makes for short bursts of fun

customer_reviews.title: Missed the turn a while back
customer_reviews.text: For starters I purchased two Renewed mini parrots. Both spin twist thirst and fly out of control for no reason whatsoever. Battery life is very short. The rc controller is a nice touch and durable, however the directions are completely wrong when setting up and linking devices. What are the chances more act like the two that I received, I reckon I'm not the only one that received bad drones. Switching out batteries did not improve their functioning at all.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty sweet. We bought a bunch of these at ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty sweet. We bought a bunch of these at work for the kids to program and had so much fun with it that I had to buy one myself. it's very easy to fly and do tricks with. This is a great beginner drone. the only downside is I wish the batteries had more than 8 min of flight time. But, beggars can't be choosers. If you do pick this drone up definitely buy these batteries.
customer_reviews.author: 34RL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Better than expected. Seven year old grandson uses it regularly and it’s still working.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Always do the software update
customer_reviews.text: I had the drone for 2 days and used it about 5 times. I was beginning to take off and the drone flew up and away. I searched for it about an hour and couldn't find it. I got on the phone with parrot and to my surprise they decided to send me another one for free. I was told that I did not do the software update and that is the reason for the flyaway. My experience could has gone a lot worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Good thank you I just have to use my cell phone anyway I don't like it. although it handles much better.
customer_reviews.author: M.Falcon

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Please watch some videos and also read the manual before first flight. Make sure to patch and check the flight settings. The flight setting allow you to set limits and behavior which makes it easier to learn.
customer_reviews.author: that guy

customer_reviews.title: Parrot SWAT MINI
customer_reviews.text: A Parrot Masterpiece. Fun level is all the way Up..
customer_reviews.author: Charles Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Crap.
customer_reviews.text: So poorly and cheaply made. Only good for a few short flights before it's rendered useless.
customer_reviews.author: James and Bobbie + *

customer_reviews.title: ALL drones that you didn't pay a very high price for have a terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Returned. ALL drones that you didn't pay a very high price for have a terrible battery life. And the expensive ones are barely acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Carine Lankford

customer_reviews.title: Useless camera
customer_reviews.text: Not even worth 10 dollars.. camera is useless and only for namesake
customer_reviews.author: here2shop

customer_reviews.title: I have a couple of drones but this one gets ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of drones but this one gets as much flight time as the bigger ones do because it handles so well indoors. Not really powerful enough to fly in any amount of wind outdoors
customer_reviews.author: kevin2174

customer_reviews.title: I have the parrot mambo and is awesome responds very well to controlled and app
customer_reviews.text: Unfortenutly has not been flying very well. Doesn't stay connected to my parrot controller. Doesn't respond to the commands from app or parrot controller. Really wanted this kind cause its able to be flown at night. 👎. I have the parrot mambo and is awesome responds very well to controlled and app.
customer_reviews.author: Will72j

customer_reviews.title: Fun drone; great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little drone, fun to play with. Easy to fly and well built. I've crashed several times and it is still strong. I gave it four stars because I wish it had a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mini drone
customer_reviews.text: Love the drone. Easy to control and operate using our tablet. Tricks are simple to do. Love the auto take off and landing. Even our youngsters can control the drone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Drone
customer_reviews.text: Flies great with a little adjustment to the settings. I recommend slowing it down if you are new to flying. On average I get about 8 minutes of flight time to a battery.
customer_reviews.author: bryson28713

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great Xmas present. . .lots of fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: John Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked like others I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Mine is having issues maintaining a steady altitude. Not sure why but it flies up to the ceiling and crashes half the time or just lands half the time. Maybe bad sonar unit?
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price - it's a fun toy. You control it from your iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Leeor Geva

customer_reviews.title: Best mini drone I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have bought every mini drones advertised by parrot and this is the most affordable controllable easy 5 fast race ready drone on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: SHANE ST JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little drone!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the price! This is my second one...the 1st one was ten times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: nice quad
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these and this one is now my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: rick steffey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson. He loves it, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Vanselow

customer_reviews.title: Indestructable little drone.
customer_reviews.text: Exellent hardware. Luke warm slash stale farts software, would be off the hizzy stank on my down low with a physical remote control. Leds are bright. Did I mention that I've crashed it 20-30 times and it is Same as delivered !!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Worst.  Purchase.  Ever.
customer_reviews.text: You know when you have paid a fair amount of money for something and then it ups and disappears? No? Well, we tried flying this on maybe 5 successful short flights. Then it took off, stopped responding to our commands and away it went. Up. And. Away. Way away. Height limiter did not work. As it left the range of our app (while we desperately tried to guide it down, hit emergency, anything) -- it was gone. The app was hardly as simple as the tutorials implied. Not for an 8 year old who is completely facile with all things digital. Not for this adult who can intuitively follow most digital controls. Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaAL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Very easy to fly with the app. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible value for the price! Doesnt fly great and lack many features that cheaper drones on the market have.
customer_reviews.author: JTL

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: My phone can't connect to this drone and each time I fly it I can't control it and it ends up crashing also battery life is terrible. This would be a good drone if it actually worked, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Eli Lande

product_meta.title: Parrot Airborne Night MiniDrone - Maclane (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Meet the new Airborne Night MiniDrone! Explore the night with two powerful headlights that offer adjustable intensity. Choose from Flash, Blink and Light Wave modes to create secret codes for your friends. While in flight, take aerial photos using the built-in VGA camera (480X640) and 1GB flash memory. If your MiniDrone comes into contact with another object, the propeller circuit breaker engages to reduce potential damage. Pilot it from your smartphone or tablet using the FreeFlight 3 app. Cruise for up to 9 minutes on one charge and reload in 25 minutes using a 2.6A charger (not included).



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


Take flight at night Go on around-the-clock adventures with your second-generation Parrot Airborne Night MiniDrone. This futuristic MiniDrone features two powerful headlights with adjustable intensity. Choose from Flash, Blink and Light Wave modes to set the mood. Add the sturdy, removable shield to take on more challenging environments. 

Twist and turn with one tap Amplify your acrobatics with 360° forward and backward flips. Tilt from 90° to 180° with a single tap.


Start your engines in seconds With the FreeFall Takeoff feature, you can release your MiniDrone into the air and the propellers immediately come to life. If your MiniDrone collides with an object, the propeller circuit breaker engages to reduce potential damage.


Fly fast and stay smooth Airborne Night is an ultra-light MiniDrone designed for stability and speed. At 1.9 oz (54 grams), you can fly fast and strong— even at night. Stay streamlined and avoid turbulence thanks to the power of the 3-axis gyroscope and accelerometer.


Take control of your flight Piloting your MiniDrone is simple with FreeFlight 3. Download the free app to your smartphone or tablet and get instant access to in-flight tricks and maneuvers. Take aerial photos during your flight and view them later with friends and family. *FreeFlight 3 is available in the App Store or in the Google Play Store.



Tips for getting started Before takeoff, be sure to update your Airborne Night's software and fully charge its battery. For double the flight time and twice the fun, pick up an extra battery with your purchase. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at 877-9Parrot (877-972-7768) or at www.parrot.com/support
feature_bullets: Agile, night-ready MiniDrone with embedded VGA mini camera (480X640)
Equipped with two powerful headlights with adjustable intensity; choose from Flash, Blink and Light Wave modes
Shock resistant and durable design makes it safe to do acrobatic flips and stunts
Free Flight Mini app gives you ultimate control from your smartphone or tablet. Bluetooth range - Max distance: Range: 20 m / 65 ft
Removable, lithium-polymer 550mAh battery lasts up to 9 minutes and recharges in 25 minutes (with 2.6A charger, not included)
